post/2009/Parrot Updates

date

2009-12-16
tags

note/2009

Parrot 1.9 was released yesterday, which meant scrubbing through post/2009/Parrot Babysteps to make sure they still work as expected. It also seems like a good time to push the newest Babystep, looking at Test::More in Parrot: post/2009/Parrot Babysteps 08 - Testing With Test::More.

That step was produced with a lot of help from Jonathan “Duke” Leto. There will be a bonus step up soon which describes how to use his Tapir test harness on UNIX-based platforms.
